response.overview: From student filmmaker Roman Natale comes a cautionary tale of a group of teenage boys who take advantage of their time in high school. They create a club where they form ideas to do the worst things possible without getting caught. If you get caught, you're kicked from the club. We follow Julian, the creator and leader of the club, with his fellow club members Luke, Nick, Shawn, and Bruce. The film is written, directed, and filmed by Roman Natale.
response.title: Justice Under God
